# injectionTime

**Instance Property**

The time at which to inject the script into the webpage.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var injectionTime: WKUserScriptInjectionTime { get }
```

## Discussion

The value is one of the constants of the enumerated type [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKUserScriptInjectionTime].

## Inspecting Script Information

- **source**: The script’s source code.
- **WKUserScriptInjectionTime**: Constants for the times at which to inject script content into a webpage.
- **isForMainFrameOnly**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to inject the script into the main frame or all frames.
